Talk1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS>But it seems like it's shaped differently
than what I saw before.<sp:5:0:0> I wonder who
moved such a big boulder.<sp:5:0:0> How strange.
Talk1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Hey!<sp:5:0:0> I was able to come here again thanks
to you! <sp:5:0:0>I actually...secretly followed you.

I was a little scared of the monsters, but I
managed because of you!
Talk1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>Mr. Hero! You got here all by your
lonesome, wow!

<sp:3:0:2:0701>You just zoomed off on your own, so I got
worried and followed you. But it was all
OK, huh?
